Codecov has a bit of a "wobble" and goes up and down in small numbers - I've never dug into why but it doesn't worry me.

Oh, that it hasn't run. :shrug: - again not concerning me much.
The travis failed because of following exception: `AirflowException: Pod Launching failed: Pod took too long to start`, do I need to restart the build or is this a known issue?
